item.description:
Sorry we couldn't offer this last month; but hope you can make it this month!

I've been soaring with Spirit lately and am looking forward to taking you along with me on the ride!

I invite you to come and immerse yourself in the space of spirit with peace, love and feeling good. Come to relax and align with who you really are and to open yourself to the joy in all that you are.

As always, all you'll have to do is listen to my voice as I guide you through the 2- 3 meditations, each one usually about 15 - 20 minutes long, with discussions in between.

This is always a most wonderful evening, and I look forward to BEing with you.

If you're plans change after you RSVP, please let us know so we won't be waiting unnecessarily for you.

If you like, you can bring a mat, blanket, and pillow to fully relax lying down. Or you can use our chairs, too, of course. Please arrive a little early to get settled.

We'll begin at 7:15 pm, and end around 8:30.

Everyone is welcome, so invite your friends and family!

Warm heart,

Ann

group.name: "Good Vibrations" Metro West Law of Attraction Community

item.name: FREE Evening of Guided Meditations and Being Who You Truly Are
